meanings.definition: Relating to the examination of tissues for the diagnosis of disease.
meanings.sent1: The histopathological report helped the doctor understand the patient's illness.
meanings.sent2: The histopathological analysis revealed the presence of cancer cells in the tissue sample.
meanings.sent3: The histopathological findings were so clear, even a child could see the problem!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a histopathological gaze, seeing beyond the surface to the underlying issues.
meanings.sent5: The histopathological details painted a vivid picture of the disease progression.

meanings.definition: Involving the study of changes in tissues caused by disease.
meanings.sent1: The histopathological research focused on understanding how diseases affect tissues.
meanings.sent2: The histopathological examination showed the impact of the virus on the organ.
meanings.sent3: The histopathological study was so fascinating, it felt like solving a mystery!
meanings.sent4: His mind worked like a histopathological microscope, zooming in on the smallest details.
meanings.sent5: The histopathological approach revealed the hidden secrets of the tissue changes.
